text: Lol don't give them ideas 🤣

Yes a new username for the amex hf

Ok I see what u meant.ok
I thought EIR 4% for $150k not bad.  If empty out in Jun then almost no interest unless got other high interest account... ?
HSBC can give 4.x% for 1 month

You can use trust account where if you fulfil there criteria (100k  salary giro  5 x trust card use  ntuc member)  you will be able to get 3.5%. The good thing is it applies up to 500k. I will use this account to store temporary and deploy my funds in/out.

Hi all  I am very confused on HSBC EGA and I plan to open it on June since the promotion going to end by 31 May.1. how much do I need to deposit for this account? E.g. uob need to hit 150K to get the highest interest2. Does the giro apply to paying credit card bill also?Tq
These videos by Chris will explain everything to you. Watch them in order because of the changes earlier this month.https://youtu.be/iebYTbH8hYYhttps://youtu.be/4SIURs2qZG4
think they are referring to this  for incremental amounts:https://www.hsbc.com.sg/content/dam/hsbc/sg/documents/accounts/everyday-global/terms-and-conditions-lny-ega-promotion.pdf

So after upgrading from HSBC premium to Premier with the deposit of $200k. Once the account is open  can I withdraw immediately the the deposit said $198k and left $2k?Then monthly I transfer $15k in and do 5 transactions.This will enable me to get the HSBC EGA (1%) of up to $500?
Anyone participated in Moomoo 6.8% in the previous round from 1 Feb to 1 April? I read the Ts and Cs and it didn't seem to be affected by this new policy  correct?
I don’t think u can since the requirements $200K TRB  actually why not change the requirements to be $15K/month requirements ?
2rd marriot bonvy points to share ...

Bros. This is one of the reason miles better than cash back. Bank points earn can be transfer to hotel loyalty programme
Marriot bonvy I feel they have quite good programme . . Give out bonus points for their members

Hilton also give out bonus points to their members.
Yes.. I also heard of it .. thanks for sharing

What is your targeted mcc ?

Ahhh so buy from heymax still whitelisted right? Then I just go over to my Klook etc to redeem it
White listed cause 5311  I usually get Klook voucher from there using UOB PPV then any remaining small tiny amount I use AMEX KFA 😂
Just note the redemption site u have to do it in browser
yes  choose the 15k monthly transfer
Any requirements from bank for an account to be upgraded to Premium other than $15k transfer ?

Yes if they still have the promo. You will need to sign a separate priority banking upgrade form with the $15k monthly in commitment.When I did it they claimed it was a 24 month promo only (must topup to $200k subsequently).Not sure if they do enforce it strictly though.
Thanks 🙏. Will check with HSBC CSO on this. As currently my Giro is above $40k. Which premium can’t go above $300
It doesn’t work when we use app ?

The voucher works  just that the redemption page is hard to locate in the app (I always copy and paste the link in the voucher redemption details)- voucher is not applied directly to your booking (works like a wallet basis)
I thought they updated through the tnc already?
Yea  but think Chris is checkin w them on the sudden change which is unfair for the customer who sign up prior the change of tnc
I'm will be clarifying the T&Cs and what to do next (as an affected user).Having said that I cannot reverse any change as decision is made by Moomoo SG.
Where to find it in the apps? Thanks!
play store or ios? look for DCS Card
Thanks I already install the dcs apps but can’t find the fee waiver button

Go to your card > card management >Request Fee Waiver
